summary: Website project for Awareness Over Addiction, including SEO sitemap support, domain setup planning, and contact page updates.
architectural_notes: Provide sitemap.xml for search engines and a visible sitemap page within the site navigation/URLs.
Project/site naming and domain targeting is awarenessoveraddictionofficial.com.

existing_features.title: Update the email address shown on the existing Contact page (India Support Contact) to exactly "awarenessoveraddictionofficial@gmail.com", including both the visible text and the mailto: link.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add both an XML sitemap (sitemap.xml) for Google and a visible sitemap page listing site pages
Support connecting a custom domain (awarenessoveraddictionofficial.com) and provide guidance/options for free domain alternatives
Update the contact email on the existing contact page to awarenessoveraddictionofficial@gmail.com
